mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_G_RES_NO.NEXTVAL AS resNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GENERAL_RESERVATION ( G_RES_NO, USER_NO, HOS_NO, G_PATIENT_NAME, G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, G_RES_DATE, G_RES_TIME, G_RES_SUBJECT, G_RES_CONTENT, G_RES_GENDER ) VALUES ( #{resNo}, #{userNo}, #{hosNo}, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}), (SELECT BIRTHDAY FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}), TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{resTime}, #{subject}, #{content}, (SELECT GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) )
INSERT INTO GUEST ( GST_NAME, GST_EMAIL, GST_PHONE, GST_BIRTH, GST_GENDER ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{gender} )
mapper.select: SELECT G_RES_NO, USER_NO, GST_NO, G_PATIENT_NAME, G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, TO_CHAR(G_RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS G_RES_DATE, G_RES_TIME, G_RES_SUBJECT, G_RES_CONTENT, G_RES_GENDER, PHONE, GST_PHONE, HOS_NAME, HOS_ADDRESS FROM GENERAL_RESERVATION JOIN HOSPITAL_INFO USING (HOS_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GUEST USING (GST_NO) WHERE G_RES_NO = #{resNo}
SELECT GST_NO, GST_NAME, GST_EMAIL, GST_PHONE, GST_BIRTH, GST_GENDER, GST_ADDRESS FROM GUEST WHERE GST_PHONE = #{phone} AND GST_EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GENERAL_RESERVATION ( HOS_NO, GST_NO, G_PATIENT_NAME, G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, G_RES_DATE, G_RES_TIME, G_RES_SUBJECT, G_RES_CONTENT, G_RES_GENDER ) VALUES ( #{hosNo}, #{guestNo}, #{userName}, #{birthday}, #{resDate}, #{resTime}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{gender} )
mapper.select: SELECT GR.G_RES_NO AS resNo, GR.USER_NO AS userNo, GR.HOS_NO AS hosNo, GR.G_PATIENT_NAME AS patientName, GR.G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY AS patientBirthday, GR.G_RES_DATE AS resDate, GR.G_RES_TIME AS resTime, GR.G_RES_SUBJECT AS resCategory, GR.G_RES_CONTENT AS resContent, HI.HOS_NAME AS hosName, HI.HOS_ADDRESS AS hosAddress FROM GENERAL_RESERVATION GR JOIN HOSPITAL_INFO HI ON GR.HOS_NO = HI.HOS_NO WHERE GR.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT G_RES_NO, USER_NO, HOS_NO, G_PATIENT_NAME, G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, TO_CHAR(G_RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS G_RES_DATE, G_RES_TIME, G_RES_SUBJECT, G_RES_CONTENT FROM GENERAL_RESERVATION WHERE HOS_NO = #{hosNo} AND TRUNC(G_RES_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT G_RES_NO, USER_NO, GST_NO, G_PATIENT_NAME, G_PATIENT_BIRTHDAY, TO_CHAR(G_RES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS G_RES_DATE, G_RES_TIME, G_RES_SUBJECT, G_RES_CONTENT, G_RES_GENDER, PHONE, GST_PHONE FROM GENERAL_RESERVATION JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GUEST USING (GST_NO) WHERE G_RES_NO = #{resNo}

SELECT G_RES_TIME AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(G_RES_TIME, 'HH24:MI') + INTERVAL '30' MINUTE, 'HH24:MI') AS END_TIME, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM GENERAL_RESERVATION WHERE HOS_NO = #{hosNo} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = G_RES_DATE GROUP BY G_RES_TIME ORDER BY G_RES_TIME
